channel.title: Scientist Doesn't let me out of Labs in QE
channel.description:
Questionable Ethics - The 3 scientists follow me to the security checkpoint at the base of the ramp back to the lobby. They ask me to "look on ahead", but they don't open he door for me. At least 1 other has had this problem:
[url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13543[/url]
I redid the entire section and it worked the 2nd time.
